property.name: DistributionType
property.dc:description: The kind of distribution it is presented.A controlled vocabulary is recommended, e.g.: SD: Species Distribution, THD: ThreatStatus Distribution, LED: Legislation Distribution.

property.name: DistributionScope
property.dc:description: A list of regions or areas where the species occurs, structured.

property.name: DistributionScopeType
property.dc:description: Categorization of scope. A controled vocabulary is recommended.

property.name: TemporalCoverage
property.dc:description: A period or point in time to which the distribution applies. A single point in time, multiple points in time, or a range of dates are allowed. Time can be expressed as calendar dates or using geologic time systems.
property.examples: Please see the individual sub fields for specific examples.

property.name: GeographicEntity
property.dc:description: A list of places included in a distribution. Each place can be include in a hierachy of places as defined by the following DwC terms: dwc:country,dwc:stateProvince,dwc:county;dwc:numincipality;dwc:locality. Hierarchical elements of each place iss to be separated by ",", and each place by ";".
